AccountId.description: A unique and immutable identifier used to identify the account resource. This identifier has no meaning to the account owner.

ProductIdentifier.description: Identifier within the parent organisation for the product. Must be unique in the organisation.

ProductName.description: The name of the product used for marketing purposes from a customer perspective. I.e. what the customer would recognise.

SecondaryProductIdentifier.description: Identifier within the parent organisation for the product. Must be unique in the organisation.
